channel.title: Affected by RNG
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Affected by RNG" - how you can be affected by RNG

item.title: Re: Affected by RNG
item.content:encoded:
Just run normal missions, any mission, and you'll have a 1% chance of the RNG activating per mission. It can take a while, but you'll get there.

As a side note, a RNG activation on a MegaMission counts as it happening 10 times.

item.title: Affected by RNG
item.content:encoded:
i need to completed the witching hour that required me affected by RNG 5 or more times.
where should i go, into regular mission or go in field ?
ty
